title: Mohamed Chikoto
text:
Mohamed Francisco Chikoto (born 28 February 1989) is a <a href="Niger">Niger</a>ien <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player, who currently plays for Algerian club <a href="ASM%20Oran">ASM Oran</a>.
Career.
He played previously with the number 3 on the shirt for <a href="Sahel%20SC">Sahel SC</a> and joined in August 2011 to <a href="Platinum%20Stars%20F.C.">Platinum Stars F.C.</a> in the South African <a href="Premier%20Soccer%20League">Premier Soccer League</a>.
In August 2012, Chikoto joined <a href="Tunisian%20Ligue%20Professionnelle%201">Tunisian Ligue Professionnelle 1</a> side <a href="AS%20Marsa">AS Marsa</a>. He left Tunisia for Cameroonian outfit <a href="Coton%20Sport%20FC%20de%20Garoua">Coton Sport</a> in July 2013.
In July 2014, Chikoto joined <a href="Algerian%20Ligue%20Professionnelle%201">Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 1</a> side <a href="ASM%20Oran">ASM Oran</a>.
International.
He is a member of the <a href="Niger%20national%20football%20team">Niger national football team</a>. He scored one of the 2 crucial goals against Guinea, that helped Niger qualify to African Nations Cup 2013.
